main_permit.Work_Description: Window change-out (same size & type) for residential buildings. Dual glazing, labeled and certified by National Fenestration Rating Council (NFRC), is required for doors and windows replaced in all residential buildings, three stories or less, per Section 152(b) of Title 24. Kitchen/bathroom remodel for residential buildings (no structural changes).Replace drywall (no new walls added) for single family dwellings and duplexes only. "COMPLY WITH DEPARTMENT ORDER effective date 05/14/2019. PERMIT WILL EXPIRE 30 DAYS FROM ISSUANCE DATE"

summary_markdown:
### DEAL SNAPSHOT
- **Address**: 540 N Gardner St, Los Angeles, CA 90036
- **Current Configuration**: 5 beds, 5 baths, 3,864 SF
- **Original Configuration**: Data not available
- **SF Added/Changed**: Data not available
- **Purchase Price**: Data not available
- **Purchase Date**: Data not available
- **Current Listing Price**: $3,811,000 (listed on November 21, 2025)
- **Hold Period**: Data not available (as purchase date is not provided)
- **Gross Spread**: Data not calculable (as purchase price is not available)
- **Gross ROI**: Data not calculable (as purchase price is not available)

### SCOPE OF WORK (PERMITS)
- The main LADBS permit relevant to the property is a **Building Alteration/Repair** permit (permit number: **19016-10000-15145**), which was finaled on **October 30, 2019**. This involved kitchen and bathroom remodeling, including a **window change-out** (same size & type), drywall replacement (without new walls added), as per compliance with the Department Order effective date **May 14, 2019**. 
- Major work completed within the last 5–10 years includes:
  - **Demolition** of existing structures (a duplex and garage).
  - Renovation work as described above.
- Currently, all identified permits have been finalized with no open or active permits noted.

### TEAM (COMPETITOR NETWORK)
- **General Contractor**: 
  - China Pacific Inc. (identified from permit number 19016-10000-15145)
  - P&M Construction And Management Inc. (multiple permits)
- **Architect**: Not listed in available data.
- **Structural Engineer**: Not listed in available data for the main permit; however, Amir Pirbadian has been involved in multiple permits.
- **Notes**: P&M Construction appears to be a repeat player involved in multiple permits, including new construction and repair work.

### PERMIT TIMING (DURATIONS)
For the main alteration permit **19016-10000-15145**:
- **Submitted → Plan Check Approved**: Not recorded.
- **Plan Check Approved → Issued**: Not recorded.
- **Issued → Finaled**: 
  - Issued on May 21, 2019
  - Finaled on October 30, 2019
  - Duration: 162 days

### VALUE-ADD SUMMARY
The property at 540 N Gardner St was purchased and underwent significant renovations, including kitchen and bathroom upgrades and window replacements. Although specific purchase and resale price data are not available, it is currently listed for $3,811,000 following these improvements. Significant value was added through extensive renovations targeting to elevate market appeal. The project saw completion around the end of 2019, with subsequent marketing starting in late 2025. 

This summary provides a concise overview for strategic development and investment considerations, aligning with current market dynamics and renovation investment potential.
